import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.scss'] }) export class HomeComponent { searchText = 'a'; handleSearchInput = (event: any) => { this.searchText = event?.target.value } handleButtonSearchClick = () => { console.log(this.searchText) } }
